name: 1st International Workshop On Innovative Teaching and Learning Practices In Education 4.0
content: Nowadays teaching and learning practices have known a radical change, due to the integration of both new information technologies and communication in the learning process. The big challenge now is how to use such technologies, models, to improve teaching quality and give learners a suitable learning experience. The main objective of the ITLPE'19 Workshop is to provide a forum for academic, research and industrial collaboration on education, innovative teaching and smart engineering education. This workshop serves as a multi- disciplinary forum to exchange ideas on education, research, development, and applications of all topics related to Education, Innovative teaching and learning practices. Submissions are welcome in all the areas of Smart learning and related topics.
